Reviews.Title: Great T.V., Slight Stand Damage
Reviews.Author: Jamie Wright
Reviews.Content: Great t.v. for a great price! Finally got the last of our projection monitors gone, so this was our houses final step into flatscreen entirely. Great colors, easy to put the stand together on it. The protective coating on the glass had a warp waver through it like it had been exposed to high temperatures and the plastic film was shrinking and tightening across it. Just a superficial issue though, and only in the stand.

ProductInfo.Features:
TV Type: LED

Maximum Resolution: 1366 x 768
